title: Quantum Transparency of Near-extremal Black Holes
summary: We investigate the scattering of electromagnetic and gravitational waves off a Reissner-Nordström black hole in the low-temperature regime where the near-horizon throat experiences large quantum fluctuations. We find that the black hole is transparent to electromagnetic and gravitational radiation of fixed helicity below a certain frequency threshold.
